title: I think I lost a Key after combining 3 fragments
body: I got enough fragments to create a key. I then went to open a chest but the game seemed to bug out. Now I'm missing a key, and I can't remember if I was at the number of chests that I currently have, or if it opened the chest and I just couldn't see the loot. Please help.

replies.body: No worries! I've got your hextech history pulled up, and it looks like you got the Pentakill Karthus skin shard from that chest. I do see him in your hextech loot, so be sure to check for that shard there!
